producte.name: Macbook air M3
producte.description: The MacBook Air M3 offers powerful performance with the efficient M3 chip, up to 18 hours of battery life, and a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display. Its ultra-thin, lightweight design is complemented by advanced features like Thunderbolt ports and Spatial Audio.

producte.name: Iphone
producte.description: The iPhone is a premium smartphone developed by Apple, known for its sleek design, powerful performance, and seamless integration with Apple's ecosystem.
